scripts.bundle: yarn run bundle:ios && yarn run bundle:android && yarn run bundle:macos && yarn run bundle:win32 && yarn run bundle:windows
scripts.bundle:ios: yarn run make-dir dist && react-native bundle --entry-file ./index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output ./dist/app.ios.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ./dist/app.ios.map && node check-bundle.js ./dist/app.ios.jsbundle ios
scripts.bundle:android: yarn run make-dir dist && react-native bundle --entry-file ./index.js --platform android --dev true --bundle-output ./dist/app.android.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ./dist/app.android.map && node check-bundle.js ./dist/app.android.jsbundle native
scripts.bundle:macos: yarn run make-dir dist && react-native bundle --entry-file ./index.js --platform macos --dev true --bundle-output ./dist/app.macos.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ./dist/app.macos.map && node check-bundle.js ./dist/app.macos.jsbundle native
scripts.bundle:win32: yarn run make-dir dist && react-native bundle --entry-file ./index.js --platform win32 --dev true --bundle-output ./dist/app.win32.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ./dist/app.win32.map && node check-bundle.js ./dist/app.win32.jsbundle win32
scripts.bundle:windows: yarn run make-dir dist && react-native bundle --entry-file ./index.js --platform windows --dev true --bundle-output ./dist/app.windows.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ./dist/app.windows.map && node check-bundle.js ./dist/app.windows.jsbundle windows
